subject: Belmont Stakes

Kentucky Derby
Horses
lead_paragraph: Kent Desormeaux, a Belmont goat last year after his ride aboard Big Brown, rode a perfect race aboard the long shot Summer Bird to capture his first Belmont Stakes.
snippet: Kent Desormeaux, a Belmont goat last year after his ride aboard Big Brown, rode a perfect race aboard the long shot Summer Bird to capture his first Belmont Stakes.
